title.rendered: CFI Launches the Operations of its UK Subsidiary

content.rendered:
The brokerage company CFI is launching the operations of its UK subsidiary – Credit Financier Invest Limited (CFI UK), after authorization by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA UK). Starting from October 14, 2019, CFI UK operates under license number FRN 828955.

 

Founders and Managing Directors of CFI Financial Group, Hisham Mansour & Eduardo Fakhoury commented:

We are glad to announce the upgrade of our presence from a Branch to a Full Subsidiary. CFI UK is a British firm fully regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. This change strengthens our UK presence and provides increased peace of mind to our clients and prospects.

CFI Subsidiary’s CEO Richard Wynn added:

The upgrade from a Branch to a Subsidiary boosts the image of CFI in the UK and beyond. As a British firm regulated by the FCA, I am confident this new step will enhance CFI’s market share in the UK and other jurisdictions. Investors look to benefit from the security and prestige of trading with an FCA regulated firm.

CFI UK is part of CFI Financial Group Holding, an online trading services provider.
